suggestions: 18. Waiver. Failure by any Party to enforce any provision of this Agreement shall not be deemed a waiver of that provision or any other provision of this Agreement. The waiver of any breach of any provision under this Agreement by any Party shall not be deemed to be a waiver of any preceding or subsequent breach, nor shall any waiver constitute a continuing waiver.
originalTexts: 18. Waiver. The waiver of any breach of any provision under this Agreement by any Party shall not be deemed to be a waiver of any preceding or subsequent breach, nor shall any waiver constitute a continuing waiver.
